fields.name: Oppressor
fields.descript: Deal 2.5% increased damage to targets with impaired movement (slow, stun, root, taunt, etc.)

fields.name: Stormraider's Surge
fields.descript: Dealing 30% of a champion's max Health within 2.5 seconds grants you 40% Movement Speed and 75% Slow Resistance for 3 seconds (10 second cooldown).

fields.name: Warlord's Bloodlust
fields.descript: Your critical strikes on enemy champions heal you for 5%-25% of the damage dealt (based on your level) and grant you 30% attack speed for 4 seconds (2 second cooldown)

fields.name: Thunderlord's Decree
fields.descript: Your 3rd attack or spell on an enemy champion calls down a lightning strike, dealing magic damage in the area. Damage: 10 per level, plus 30% of your Bonus Attack Damage, and 10% of your Ability Power (20 second cooldown).

fields.name: Bandit
fields.descript: Gain 1 gold for each nearby minion killed by an ally. Gain 3 gold (10 if melee) when hitting an enemy champion with a basic attack (5 second cooldown)

fields.name: Double Edged Sword
fields.descript: Melee: Deal 3% additional damage, take 1.5% additional damage. Ranged: Deal and take 2% additional damage

fields.name: Runic Affinity
fields.descript: Buffs from neutral monsters last 15% longer

fields.name: Explorer
fields.descript: +15 Movement Speed in Brush and River

fields.name: Strength of the Ages
fields.descript: Siege minions and large monsters that you or nearby allied champions kill grant 20 and 10 permanent Health, respectively (300 max). After reaching the max bonus, these kills instead restore 6% of your Maximum Health.

fields.name: Merciless
fields.descript: Deal 5% increased damage to champions below 40% Health

fields.name: Tough Skin
fields.descript: You take 2 less damage from champion and neutral monster basic attacks

fields.name: Insight
fields.descript: Reduces the cooldown of Summoner Spells by 15%

fields.name: Perseverance
fields.descript: +50% Base Health Regen, increased to +200% when below 25% Health

fields.name: Dangerous Game
fields.descript: Champion kills and assists restore 5% of your missing Health and Mana

fields.name: Bounty Hunter
fields.descript: Deal 1% increased damage for each unique enemy champion you have killed

fields.name: Feast
fields.descript: Killing a unit restores 20 Health (25 second cooldown)

fields.name: Savagery
fields.descript: Single target attacks and spells deal 5 bonus damage to minions and monsters

fields.name: Secret Stash
fields.descript: Your Potions and Elixirs last 10% longer. Your Health Potions are replaced with Biscuits that restore 20 Health and 10 Mana instantly on use

fields.name: Runic Armor
fields.descript: Shields, healing, regeneration, and lifesteal on you are 8% stronger

fields.name: Legendary Guardian
fields.descript: +3 Armor and Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion

fields.name: Assassin
fields.descript: Deal 1.5% increased damage when no allied champions are nearby

fields.name: Grasp of the Undying
fields.descript: Every 4 seconds in combat your next attack against an enemy champion steals life equal to 3% of your max Health (halved for ranged champions, deals magic damage)

fields.name: Precision
fields.descript: Gain 3 + .3 per level Magic Penetration and Armor Penetration

fields.name: Intelligence
fields.descript: Your Cooldown Reduction cap is increased to 45% and you gain 5% Cooldown Reduction

fields.name: Natural Talent
fields.descript: +10 Attack Damage and 15 Ability Power at level 18 (0.55 Attack Damage and 0.83 Ability Power per level)

fields.name: Deathfire Touch
fields.descript: Your damaging abilities cause enemy champions to take magic damage equal to 8 + 60% of your Bonus Attack Damage and 25% of your Ability Power, over 4 seconds. Deathfire Touch has reduced effectiveness when applied by area of effect and damage over time abilities. - Area of Effect: 2 second duration. - Damage over time: 1 second duration.

fields.name: Meditation
fields.descript: Regenerate 1.5% of your missing Mana every 5 seconds

fields.name: Bond of Stone
fields.descript: +4% Damage Reduction. 6% of the damage from enemy champions taken by the nearest allied champion is dealt to you instead.

fields.name: Windspeaker's Blessing
fields.descript: Your heals and shields are 10% stronger. Additionally, your shields and heals on other allies increase their armor by 5-22 (based on level) and their magic resistance by half that amount for 3 seconds.

fields.name: Fervor of Battle
fields.descript: You generate stacks of Fervor by hitting enemy champions with attacks and abilities. Your basic attacks deal 1-14 bonus physical damage (based on your level) to enemy champions for each of your stacks of Fervor (max 8 stacks). Attacking enemy champions generates 1 stack of Fervor (2 for melee champions) and damaging enemy champions with an ability generates 2 stacks of Fervor (2 second cooldown). Stacks of Fervor last 6 seconds.

fields.descript: +0.05 mana regen / 5 sec. per level (+0.9 at champion level 18)

fields.descript: +0.3 health per level (+5.4 at champion level 18)

fields.name: Ignite
fields.descript: Ignites target enemy champion, dealing 70-410 true damage (depending on champion level) over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target, and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.

fields.name: Mark
fields.descript: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.

fields.name: Heal
fields.descript: Restores 90-345 Health (depending on champion level) and grants 30% Movement Speed for 1 second to you and target allied champion. This healing is halved for units recently affected by Summoner Heal.

fields.name: Clairvoyance
fields.descript: Reveals a small area of the map for your team for 5 seconds.

fields.name: Exhaust
fields.descript: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 30%, their Armor and Magic Resist by 10, and their damage dealt by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

fields.name: Garrison
fields.descript: Allied Turret: Grants massive regeneration for 8 seconds. Enemy Turret: Reduces damage dealt by 80% for 8 seconds.

fields.name: Poro Toss
fields.descript: Toss a Poro at your enemies. If it hits, you can quickly travel to your target as a follow up.

fields.name: Ghost
fields.descript: Your champion can move through units and has 27% increased Movement Speed for 10 seconds

fields.name: To the King!
fields.descript: Quickly travel to the Poro King's side.

fields.name: Clarity
fields.descript: Restores 40% of your champion's maximum Mana. Also restores allies for 40% of their maximum Mana

fields.name: Smite
fields.descript: Deals 390-1000 true damage (depending on champion level) to target epic or large monster or enemy minion.

fields.name: Cleanse
fields.descript: Removes all disables and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and lowers the duration of incoming disables by 65% for 3 seconds.

fields.name: Barrier
fields.descript: Shields your champion for 115-455 (depending on champion level) for 2 seconds.

fields.name: Teleport
fields.descript: After channeling for 3.5 seconds, teleports your champion to target allied structure, minion, or ward.

fields.name: Flash
fields.descript: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.
